title: Republish app to fix deployment error

requirements.text: Republish the application to resolve the canister deployment error and generate a valid working URL
acceptanceCriteria: App is successfully deployed to the Internet Computer
A valid canister URL is generated that does not return Error 400
The URL successfully loads the apology message interface with Maham's name, hearts, and flowers
The canister ID is properly resolved by the Internet Computer gateway

constraints: Preserve all existing frontend functionality including the interactive reveal, animated hearts, and blue flowers
Maintain the current romantic pink/red aesthetic and Playfair Display typography
Keep the heartfelt apology message with emojis in the fourth paragraph
nonGoals: Setting up a custom domain (this requires external DNS configuration)
Changing the visual design or content of the apology message
